text: Gujarati is commonly used in customer support flows across Gujarat businesses.
Hindi is widely used in Indian news, cinema, and public communication.
Tamil has a long literary history and remains active in modern digital communities.
Kannada is frequently used in regional tech support and commerce interfaces in Karnataka.
Bengali has a strong publishing ecosystem and public readership in eastern India.
Marathi is widely used in state-level administration and civic services in Maharashtra.
Malayalam is commonly used in patient communication across Kerala healthcare settings.
Telugu media is highly active across entertainment and digital creator ecosystems.
Punjabi is a dominant language in several contemporary Indian music scenes.
Odia is used in schooling and local education delivery in Odisha.
